mapper.select: SELECT s.device_number, MAX(s.measure_time) AS sensor_measure_time, MAX(e.measure_time) AS event_measure_time, CASE WHEN MAX(e.measure_time) = NOW() THEN 'Danger' ELSE 'Safe' END AS alarm FROM rrps.mb_sensor s LEFT JOIN rrps.mb_event e ON s.device_number = e.device_number GROUP BY s.device_number ORDER BY s.device_number
